entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 06:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: NE 44 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing this morning. Amount 15 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 20 this evening then light before morning. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
